resource.string: [[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by putting a bounty on their head.
Advises local officials, thereby [[col:green]]increasing tax rates[[/col]] while helping [[col:green]]protect local settlements against authoritarian agent actions[[/col]].
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character face to face.
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting their fears and weaknesses.
"[[col:green]]Intensifies servile disorder[[/col]] in the target settlement, leading it towards a slave revolt. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective where there is no slave unrest.[[/col]]"
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character from afar before they have a chance to react.
"[[col:green]]Reduces equipment bonuses[[/col]] for all units in the army. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective where units have no equipment bonuses.[[/col]]"

"[[col:green]]Reveals an as-yet undiscovered army, settlement or agent[[/col]] belonging to the target army's faction. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective once full knowledge of the faction’s possessions has been achieved.[[/col]]"
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting their fears and weaknesses.

Corrupts local officials, thereby [[col:green]]diminishing tax rates[[/col]]. The disruptions in government also leaves local settlements [[col:green]]vulnerable to authoritarian agent actions[[/col]].
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting to their greed and vanity.
"[[col:green]]Inflicts considerable damage[[/col]] against a specific unit in the target army. [[col:yellow]]Units cannot be completely destroyed in an assault.[[/col]]"
"[[col:green]]Reduces the zeal[[/col]] of the target army's general. [[col:yellow]]General attributes may not be reduced below 1.[[/col]]"
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by appealing to their sense of reason.
[[col:green]]Increases the zeal[[/col]] of the parent army's general and progressively [[col:green]]increases the experience[[/col]] of all its units.
Challenges the target character to a “fair and honourable” [[col:green]]fight to the death[[/col]].
Causes [[col:green]]major damage[[/col]] to a single building in the target settlement.
"Inflicts [[col:green]]minor damage[[/col]] upon all units in the target army. [[col:yellow]]Units cannot be completely destroyed by poisoning.[[/col]]"
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting to their greed and vanity.
"Gradually [[col:green]]spreads your culture[[/col]] throughout the local province. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective where your culture is already dominant.[[/col]]"
[[col:green]]Increases the cunning[[/col]] of the parent army's general whilst helping to [[col:green]]protect it against all enemy agent actions[[/col]].

Establishes a local spy network, improving the [[col:green]]chance of detecting hidden agents and armies[[/col]] in the area whilst [[col:green]]protecting local settlements from cunning agent actions[[/col]].
"[[col:green]]Increases public order penalties[[/col]] from foreign cultures in the target province. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective where there are no foreign cultures present.[[/col]]"

Wreaks [[col:green]]despair amongst the populace[[/col]] with small-scale military actions. The struggle to maintain order also leaves local settlements [[col:green]]vulnerable to zealous agent actions[[/col]].
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by manipulating somebody close to them.
"Inflicts [[col:green]]major damage[[/col]] upon a single local garrison unit in the target settlement. [[col:yellow]]Units cannot be completely destroyed in an assault.[[/col]]"
[[col:green]]Impedes the melee and ranged combat[[/col]] potential of all units in the target army.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by tainting their food or drink.
Causes [[col:green]]minor damage[[/col]] across the target settlement and reduces the local slave population.

Establishes a local spy network, improving the [[col:green]]chance of detecting hidden agents and armies[[/col]] in the area whilst leaving local settlements [[col:green]]vulnerable to cunning agent actions[[/col]].
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by appealing to their sense of reason.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character after betraying their trust.

Brings word of glorious battles and great victories, thereby [[col:green]]inspiring the local populace[[/col]]. This rise in military fervour also helps [[col:green]]protect local settlements from zealous agent actions[[/col]].
[[col:green]]Spreads unhappiness[[/col]] in the target settlement, potentially driving the population to revolt.
Acquires a [[col:green]]small amount of wealth[[/col]], increasing as the champion wanders further from friendly territory.
[[col:green]]Reduces the morale and charge bonus[[/col]] of all units in the target army.
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by appealing to their sense of reason.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character in self-defence, having coaxed them into attacking.
[[col:green]]Increases the authority[[/col]] of the parent army's general and [[col:green]]reduces upkeep costs[[/col]].
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting their fears and weaknesses.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character through swift and merciless brutality.
Allows [[col:green]]covert movement[[/col]] about the campaign map, unseen unless spotted by keen-eyed rivals.
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting to their greed and vanity.
"[[col:green]]Reduces the authority[[/col]] of the target army's general. [[col:yellow]]General attributes may not be reduced below 1.[[/col]]"
"Inflicts [[col:green]]minor damage[[/col]] upon all local garrison units in the target settlement. [[col:yellow]]Units cannot be completely destroyed by poisoning.[[/col]]"
"[[col:green]]Reduces the cunning[[/col]] of the target army's general. [[col:yellow]]General attributes may not be reduced below 1.[[/col]]"
"Zealously [[col:green]]spreads your culture[[/col]] within the target province. [[col:yellow]]Ineffective where your culture is already dominant.[[/col]]"
